attributes.action: Create stricter guidelines for people living in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more and more people are emagrating to britain every year. we need stricter guidelines to stop them from entering our country, other countries wouldn't allow this so why do we? also other countries say that you must have a job, be sponsered or have a certain amount of money to be able to emagrate there.
